name: Roll Or Die (sox)
description:
Inspired by the GMTK 2022 Game Jam prompt Roll of the Dice, you are quite literally a dice (albeit a 2D one) that must roll to navigate across pseudorandomly generated platforms. 

But you cannot jump without some luck... You must roll a four in order to jump! 

Game music composed by Megzie_.

Game written with JavaScript with the P5 and Matter.Js Libraries.
